name: kawi
description: Kawi is a solid and clean theme for blogs and any other sites. It has clean typography, plenty of white space and puts the emphasis on your content.

scripts.build: npm run sass && npm run css && npm run terser && npm run make-pot && npm run archive
scripts.terser: terser js/main.js -o js/main.min.js && terser js/customizer.js -o js/customizer.min.js

author: Vincent Dubroeucq
